ValidationRule.description: For PEO Web Based Onboarding, When the field Final WC Approval Complete gets a date entered the field Workers compensation Type has to have a value and ALSO the value can not equal SR NO WC COI. Any other values you should be able to save the date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR ( AND(RecordTypeId = '012700000001jeX', NOT(ISBLANK( Reply_from_WC_Underwriting__c )) , ISPICKVAL(Workers_Compensation_Type__c, '' ) ),
AND(RecordTypeId = '0120g000000l3qD', NOT(ISBLANK( Reply_from_WC_Underwriting__c )) , ISPICKVAL(Workers_Compensation_Type__c, '' ) ),
AND(RecordTypeId = '012700000001jeX',NOT(ISBLANK( Reply_from_WC_Underwriting__c )) , ISPICKVAL(Workers_Compensation_Type__c, 'SR NO WC COI') ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Workers Compensation type needs to have a value and it can not be equal to SR NO WC COI.
